resources.string:
Please help us to help you!

If you find a bug with any of these settings, please open up a ticket on Jira or contact a DU developer with the following.

1. Logcat or Last_Kmsg
2. Kernel and Mods used
3. Any useful information

If you fail to report something, do not expect things to be fixed. Remember, we are not perfect, we do miss things.

Welcome to DU Tweaks.

This is the app that will allow you to change the look, feel, and capabilities of your device. If you do not understand a feature in DU Tweaks, please research it. If you are looking for something, please look in all settings before asking where it is at.
If something is not included, then we haven't added it! That doesn't mean it is missing and that doesn't mean you need to ask for it. Either we don't like the feature, we think it is pointless, or we are working on importing it and haven't finished it yet.

Please be patient and remember that this is a hobby for us, we don't get paid for it, and we provide it to you guys for FREE!!
